sentences.english: I want to daydream about have a big house with a big swimming pool and hurst motte wood.
sentences.chinese: 我想有一個很大的房子和很大的游泳池，樹林。

sentences.english: Brand new wide sliding door leads you to the cozy back yard with pool and fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 全新的大滑門帶你到後院的舒適游泳池，還有果樹。

sentences.english: Versatility. Just like Phelps in the pool.
sentences.chinese: 一如菲爾普斯在泳池上那麼多才多藝。

sentences.english: Neither the Concorde nor the Napoléon has a swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 協和和拿破崙飯店都沒有游泳池。

sentences.english: Exspecially the swimming pool, how can it be so relaxing?
sentences.chinese: 特別是這個游泳池，氣氛怎麼可以這麼放鬆呢？

sentences.english: State-of-the-art fine dining and all-day dining restaurant overlook the skylobby and pool.
sentences.chinese: 藝術和美食餐廳一應而全，俯瞰着空中大堂和泳池。

sentences.english: Wang and his roommates used 10 buckets of water to fill the inflatable pool.
sentences.chinese: 王曉星和室友們用了10桶水才把充氣泳池填滿。

sentences.english: The swimming pool will be roofed over in October this year.
sentences.chinese: 游泳池將於今年十月加蓋屋頂。

sentences.english: In this example of swimming pool wall the conditions for performing corrosion rate measurements were not ideal.
sentences.chinese: 案例裏的游泳池池壁的腐蝕速率測試環境不理想。

sentences.english: You can hold on to the edge of the pool or dock for support.
sentences.chinese: 你可以抓住泳池或船塢的邊緣支撐自己。

sentences.english: My assistants were hanging over the edge of the pool with plugged-in strobes .
sentences.chinese: 我的助手們拿着插入式電源閘擠在游泳池邊上。

sentences.english: I got out of the pool and stood under one of the poolside showers while he cleared up.
sentences.chinese: 在他清理泳池的時候，我上來在池邊淋浴。

sentences.english: It is crowned by a rooftop terrace with an outdoor saltwater swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 整個套房由帶有海水游泳池的天台環繞。

sentences.english: Community laundry, pool and rec room .
sentences.chinese: 社區洗衣房，游泳池和娛樂室。

sentences.english: Each cabin has a large eucalyptus globulus wood beds and swimming pools.
sentences.chinese: 每間小屋都有桉木的大牀和游泳池。

sentences.english: With a shadowy triumph, she trims the swimming-suit rim at the swimming-pool fringe.
sentences.chinese: 她帶著暗淡的喜悅在泳池邊整理泳裝的邊緣。

definition: sandpit (for children's play or for long jump etc)/sandbox
